column2: provided  an explanation  as  to  why  they  did  not conduct a  search  of  his
information  received  from  a  private  informant.  As  such  there  was  no

column1: necessity to further conduct a  search and he had used his discretion as the

column2: team  leader not to  carry out a  search although he had  the necessary  man
power to carry out such a search.
